idea-plugin.name: Android Now Activity
idea-plugin.description:
Android Now Activity Plugin

English:

A powerful Android Studio plugin that displays the current active Android Activity in real-time. This plugin provides an intuitive tool window interface to help developers quickly understand their app's Activity status.

Features:

  • Real-time Activity Monitoring: Automatically detects and displays the current foreground Activity
  • Multi-device Support: Supports multiple connected Android devices simultaneously
  • Activity History: Shows recent Activity list with timestamps (configurable quantity)
  • One-click Copy: Single click to copy Activity short name, double click for full class name
  • Theme Adaptive: Automatically adapts to IDE's dark/light theme
  • Configurable Settings: Customizable refresh interval, history count, etc.

中文:

一个强大的 Android Studio 插件，用于实时显示当前连接设备上正在运行的 Activity。该插件提供了直观的工具窗口界面，帮助开发者快速了解应用的 Activity 状态。

主要功能:

  • 实时Activity监控: 自动检测并显示当前前台Activity
  • 多设备支持: 支持同时连接多个Android设备
  • Activity历史记录: 显示最近访问的Activity列表（可配置数量）
  • 一键复制: 单击复制Activity简名，双击复制完整类名
  • 主题自适应: 自动适配IDE的深色/浅色主题
  • 可配置设置: 刷新间隔、历史记录数量等可自定义

Compatibility / 兼容性:

  • Android Studio 2021.3 (Build 213) or newer / 或更新版本
  • Supports Android 7+ devices / 支持 Android 7+ 设备
  • Multi-layer compatibility strategy for different Android versions / 针对不同Android版本的多层兼容策略
